# Gopher the Gold
### @explicitHints true
### @flyoutOnly true

## Let's Get Gopher Crazy! @showdialog

Get the gopher to the acorn.

![An anigif of what we need to do](/static/mcj/gopher/gopher4.gif "Look what we're about to do today!")




## {Get to the Acorns}


Use a loop to get the acorn!

---

```block
loops.loopThis(4, function (){ })
```

---





#### ~ tutorialhint

```blocks
  controller.onA( function () {
    //@highlight
    loops.loopThis(4, function () {
        sprites.step_down()
    })
})
```


```validation.global
# BlocksExistValidator
```



```package
pxt-tilemaps=github:microsoft/pxt-tilemaps
pxt-characterAnimations=github:microsoft/arcade-character-animations
makecodejr-assets=github:kiki-lee/makecodejr-assets
arcade-block-icons=github:kiki-lee/arcade-block-icons#v0.0.13

```

```template
  controller.onA( function () {})
```




```customts

// can't use controller events because it would override
// the user's controller handlers. this works okay but
// it's a little glitchy in the grid layout
let debounce = 100
control.runInParallel(function () {
    while (true) {
        controller.pauseUntilAnyButtonIsPressed();
        if (controller.A.isPressed()) {
            onAButtonPressed();
            pause(debounce);
        }
    }
})

// Check to see if user has started their program
function onAButtonPressed() {
    aPressed = 1
}


// Behind the scenes set-up
let mySprite: Sprite = null
let stillWalking = 0
let aPressed = 0
let nuts = 0

// Set up background and tilemap
scene.setBackgroundImage(assets.image`bg1`)
scene.setBackgroundColor(1)
tiles.setTilemap(tilemap`ground4`)


sprites.onCreated(SpriteKind.Food, function (sprite) {
    sprite.setImage(assets.image`nut`)
    nuts += 1
    //info.setScore(nuts)
})
sprites.onOverlap(SpriteKind.Player, SpriteKind.Food, function (sprite, otherSprite) {
    sprites.destroy(otherSprite, effects.disintegrate, 100)
    nuts += -1
    //info.setScore(nuts)
})

// Put nuts in each hole tile
tiles.createSpritesOnTiles(assets.tile`nut`, SpriteKind.Food)



// Set up sprite, animation, and location
mySprite = sprites.create(assets.image`gopher`, SpriteKind.Player)
tiles.placeOnRandomTile(mySprite, assets.tile`start`)
animation.runImageAnimation(
    mySprite,
    assets.animation`bob`,
    75,
    true
)


game.onUpdateInterval(1000, function () {
    if (characterAnimations.matchesRule(mySprite, characterAnimations.rule(Predicate.NotMoving)) && stillWalking <= 0) {
        if (aPressed == 1 && nuts==0) {
            game.over(true)
        } else if (aPressed == 1) {
            game.over(false)
        }
    }
    stillWalking += -1
})



namespace sprites {


    //% block="`ICON.arrow-right-white`"
    export function step_right() {
        stillWalking = 2
        tiles.setWallAt(mySprite.tilemapLocation().getNeighboringLocation(CollisionDirection.Right), false)
        tiles.setTileAt(mySprite.tilemapLocation().getNeighboringLocation(CollisionDirection.Right), assets.tile`hole`)
        for (let index = 0; index < 8; index++) {
            mySprite.x += 2
            pause(50)
        }
        pause(500)
    }

    //% block="`ICON.arrow-left-white`"
    export function step_left() {
        stillWalking = 2
        tiles.setWallAt(mySprite.tilemapLocation().getNeighboringLocation(CollisionDirection.Left), false)
        tiles.setTileAt(mySprite.tilemapLocation().getNeighboringLocation(CollisionDirection.Left), assets.tile`hole`)
        for (let index = 0; index < 8; index++) {
            mySprite.x -= 2
            pause(50)
        }
        pause(500)
    }

        //% block="`ICON.arrow-up-white`"
        export function step_up() {
            stillWalking = 2
            tiles.setWallAt(mySprite.tilemapLocation().getNeighboringLocation(CollisionDirection.Top), false)
            tiles.setTileAt(mySprite.tilemapLocation().getNeighboringLocation(CollisionDirection.Top), assets.tile`hole`)
            for (let index = 0; index < 8; index++) {
                mySprite.y -= 2
                pause(50)
            }
            pause(500)
        }


        //% block="`ICON.arrow-down-white`"
        export function step_down() {
            stillWalking = 2    
            tiles.setWallAt(mySprite.tilemapLocation().getNeighboringLocation(CollisionDirection.Bottom), false)
            tiles.setTileAt(mySprite.tilemapLocation().getNeighboringLocation(CollisionDirection.Bottom), assets.tile`hole`)
            for (let index = 0; index < 8; index++) {
                mySprite.y += 2
                pause(50)
            }
            pause(500)
        }



    }

    namespace loops{

        //% block="`ICON.arrow-repeat-white` x $times"
        //% times.defl=4
        //% handlerStatement
        export function loopThis(times:number, handler: () => void): void {
            for (let index = 0; index < times; index++) {
                handler();
            }
        }
        
    }

    namespace controller {
        /**
         * Register code run when a controller event occurs
        * @param event
        * @param handler
        */
        //% weight=99 blockGap=8
        //% blockId=ctrlonA block="on `ICON.a-button-white-invert`"
        //% help=docs/on-a
        export function onA(handler: () => void) {
        controller.A.onEvent(ControllerButtonEvent.Pressed, handler)
        }
    }


```

    "theme": "junior",

            "#A4839F",
            "#5C406c",
            "#DA9E96",
            "#91463d",
            "#000000"
        ]
}
